title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Cuomo taxing out-of-state healthcare volunteers. Media made hero out of doofus Cuomo. Red State governors kept their states safe. Cuomo amazed at "historic" subway car disinfection. Cuomo put infected people in nursing homes to die. Cuomo explains why he's taxing volunteer emergency workers. Texas salon owner sentenced to jail for opening her business. Lockdown scientist Neil Ferguson resigns after breaking lockdown rules to meet his married lover. The worldwide forces who want to keep us locked down are more powerful than you know. Politico founder says he doesn't care about Biden and Tara Reade, get rid of Trump at all costs. Biden lead evaporates in poll. Celebrities back lockdown for climate change.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Dems want to get rid of Trump and overturn 2016 election, which are two different things. They hate Trump and want him gone, but they are also embarrassed by losing in 2016, how wrong they were. Good time to watch '16 election night footage. Rush's friends are very worried about the impact on the economy, erosion of freedom, fear for future. Hollywood, science, media all together on locking down world, decimating the economy. Texas salon owner. Why are so many people rooting against hydroxychloroquine? There may never be a vaccine. Los Alamos lab says virus has mutated. NJ allows renters to use security deposit for rent.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Trump answers question on accepting deaths to open the economy. Rush watched Michael Moore's movie. Rush's theory that Democrats can't avoid obsessing on death. We may never get a vaccine. Human beings cannot avoid death. Texas AG tells judge to free salon owner sent to jail. Cattle farmer having a hard time making ends meet. Aren't we all essential?



Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
